seeds.text: Cluster alpha outage response references playbook code PB-447.
PB-447 requires traffic drain and staged restart across gateway tier.
Regulation pack RC-22 maps to retention profile RD-91.
RD-91 enforces 400-day retention and legal hold exports.
Pager policy uses rota profile ROTA-X9 for overnight incidents.
ROTA-X9 escalation path starts at #infra-oncall then SRE manager.
Cost anomaly workflow references analyzer profile A-77.
A-77 raises severity-high when spend delta exceeds 18 percent.
